DOC.brief_title: Smoking Cessation Workplaces Hong Kong Phase II
DOC.detailed_description: Study design In Phase I study , large scale cross-sectional survey send 3000 corporation Hong Kong . The questionnaire examine employer ' knowledge , attitude practice promote smoke cessation workplace . In Phase II , longitudinal study conduct evaluate effectiveness smoke cessation intervention offer Department Psychology , University Hong Kong . A total 600 smoker corporation recruit interview intervention baseline , immediately intervention , 1- , 4- , 12- , 26- 52-week post-intervention follow-up , attempt evaluate smoking behaviour , knowledge smoking satisfaction smoking cessation service . Self-reported quitter ( smoke past 7 day ) invited participate bio-chemical validation assess exhaled carbon monoxide level saliva cotinine level . Process evaluation : Qualitative interview , include in-depth interview and/or focus group conduct within 1 month 12-month follow-up .
